mapper.select: select id, user_name username, password from sv_user where user_name = #{admin.username} and password = #{admin.password} and status = 2;

select ui.user_name userName, ui.user_id userId, ui.age age, ui.mobile_phone mobilePhone, ui.user_avatar userAvatar, ui.sex sex, ui.area area, ui.introduction introduction, ui.fans fans, ui.attentions attentions, su.status status, su.create_time createTime from sv_user su left join user_info ui on su.id = ui.user_id where su.status < 2
and ui.user_name like concat('%', #{userInfo.userName}, '%')

select v.id id, v.author_id authorId, u.user_name authorName, u.user_avatar authorAvatar, v.create_time createTime, v.url url, v.cover cover, v.description description, v.likes likes, v.duration duration, v.downloads downloads, v.comments comments, v.hot hot from video v left join user_info u on v.author_id = u.user_id
mapper.update: update sv_user set status = (case when #{userInfo.status} then 1 else 0 end) where id = #{userInfo.userId};
update sv_user set password = #{user.password} where id = #{user.id};
